Started web Designer after creating Google Street View. Later became interested in application development and worked as a programmer. I also occasionally plan and direct events.

projects.title: Call from India
projects.description: Call from India is an immersive experience where participants receive an unexpected phone call from India. Following the instructions provided over the phone, they are drawn deeper into a captivating story. As part of the operation team, I handle both planning and scriptwriting. Additionally, I oversee the experience in real-time, monitoring participants and coordinating with phone operators and actors to ensure a seamless, engaging adventure.

projects.title: Motemagedon
projects.description: It is what is called feeling couple app. This application creates an opportunity to connect with more people at a party or other dating events.

projects.title: Community shuffle sports day
projects.description: Bringing all communities together to co-sponsor a major sports day. As a management member, responsible for planning, sales, and design.

projects.description: This is a mental support service specialized for nurses. It's developed with medical professionals and other experts

projects.title: Seikatu calendar
